unnormalised: The projected revenue for FY24-25 is Rs. 125.6 Cr, a 15% increase YoY. However, the actual expenditure exceeded the budgeted amount by Rs. 7.8 lakh, primarily due to unforeseen marketing costs. A detailed analysis is required to reconcile the difference and improve budget allocation efficiency for the upcoming fiscal year. We also need to examine why the Q3 performance fell short of the projected 28% growth, only achieving 22.5%.
normalised: The projected revenue for F-Y two thousand twenty four to twenty five is rupee one hundred twenty five point six crore, a fifteen percent increase Y-o-Y. However, the actual expenditure exceeded the budgeted amount by rupee seven point eight lakh, primarily due to unforeseen marketing costs. A detailed analysis is required to reconcile the difference and improve budget allocation efficiency for the upcoming fiscal year. We also need to examine why the Q-three performance fell short of the projected twenty eight percent growth, only achieving twenty two point five percent.
